Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2009 07:08PM - edited Feb 16, 2009 07:09PM by Lisa6462 Hi diamondgurl,  I agree 100% with Cathy.  My double mastectomy is scheduled for this Thursday at the National Naval Medical Center in Bethesda.  It's been hell wondering if I am being to radical.  I have DCIS with positive hormone receptors.  It's been caught very early and I want to be done with this breast cancer thing and move on with healing.  I'm 44 years old.  I'll be having immediate reconstruction with tissue expanders.  Didn't have enough tummy fat to make boobs with.  Damn you weight watchers!!  LOL  Good luck with your decision making. Lisa
Posts.Title: Bilateral Mastectomy DiamondGurl Superwoman808
